data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Class::PObject works very much like Class::Struct, but created
    objects can store themselves into disk using either of 'file', 'cvs'
    or 'mysql' drivers. Approach of Class::PObject for solving object
    persistency is different from other alternative solutions - major
    difference is its interface - simple and intuitive.

    You can refer to its online manual for details.
